column1: 25970,Mighty Avengers (2007) #26,26,63154,22,"DARK REIGN The Avengers/Fantastic Four slobberknocker continues!  This one's got it all true believers:  from MR. FANTASTIC and HANK PYM'S battle of the brains to HERCULES and THE THING'S battle o' the brawn!  When it's over, expect BIG changes for Earth's Mightiest Heroes-- including the team's all-new headquarters and a very disturbing DARK REIGN alliance. Rated A ...$2.99",
